meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of pycnidia.
meanings.sent1: The pycnidial structures were small and round.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the pycnidial growth patterns in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The pycnidial appearance of the plant surprised the gardener.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a pycnidial paradise, full of unique structures.
meanings.sent5: The pycnidial features of the fungus made it easy to identify.

meanings.sent1: The pycnidial branches were carefully examined under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The tree's pycnidial bark provided a habitat for various insects.
meanings.sent3: The pycnidial nature of the fruit made it a favorite snack for birds.
meanings.sent4: The forest floor was a pycnidial factory, producing spores endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The pycnidial plant emitted a unique scent that attracted pollinators.
